painPoints.title: Complex Partner Contract Management
painPoints.description: Managing contracts with record labels, podcast creators, and advertising partners requires sophisticated contract lifecycle management beyond current capabilities.

painPoints.title: Ad Sales Quote Turnaround Time
painPoints.description: Competition from YouTube and others requires faster advertising quote cycles. Current process taking too long for competitive deals.

opportunities.title: Advanced Contract Lifecycle Management
opportunities.description: Expand CLM capabilities for complex creator and partner agreements with automated renewals and tiering

opportunities.title: Advertising CPQ Enhancement
opportunities.description: Build specialized advertising CPQ for podcast and music streaming ad packages

opportunities.title: Creator Economy Tooling
opportunities.description: CPQ for Spotify's creator marketplace and tools subscription offerings
